item.title: ‘Only Murders in the Building’ Showrunner John Hoffman Teases Season 5: “We’re Doing Something We Haven’t Done Before”
item.description: Plus, Hoffman reflects on the fourth season that added amazing guest stars to the roster and took the production to Los Angeles.

item.title: ‘Only Murders in the Building’ Showrunner John Hoffman Teases Season 5: “We’re Doing Something We Haven’t Done Before”
item.description: Plus, Hoffman reflects on the fourth season that added amazing guest stars to the roster and took the production to Los Angeles.

item.title: ‘Only Murders in the Building’ Returns to the Scene of the Crime(s) in Season 5 Trailer
item.description: Hulu’s murder mystery comedy is set to premiere Sept. 9.

item.title: ‘Only Murders in the Building’ Sets Season 5 Premiere Date
item.description: The new season will also introduce new characters played by Bobby Cannavale, Logan Lerman, Téa Leoni, Keegan-Michael Key and more.
